scripts.build: npm run inst && npm run build:cds && npm run build:ui && npm run copy:common && npm run build:ts && npm run replace:paths && npm run cleanup:ts
scripts.cicd: npm run inst && npm run build:cds && npm run build:ui && npm run copy:common && npm run build:tsnpx && npm run replace:paths && npm run cleanup:ts
scripts.build:ui: npm run build --prefix ../../code/app/aisaas-ui-ui5/ && npm run copy --prefix ../../code/app/aisaas-ui-ui5/
scripts.copy:common: npx --yes shx cp -r ../../code/srv/common ../../code/gen/api && npx shx cp -r ../../code/srv/common ../../code/gen/app
scripts.ui:apps: npm run ui:init && npm run ui:aisaas-ui
scripts.ui:aisaas-ui: npm run build --prefix ../../code/app/aisaas-ui-ui5/ && npm run copy --prefix ../../code/app/aisaas-ui-ui5/
scripts.build:all: npm run build:srv && npm run build:db-com && npm run build:router && npm run build:api && npm run build:broker && npm run build:html5-deployer
scripts.build:srv: cross-env-shell pack build $IMAGE_PREFIX/aisaas-srv -p ../../code/gen/app -B paketobuildpacks/builder:base -b paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./node_modules/@sap/cds/bin/cds-serve.js -e BP_NODE_RUN_SCRIPTS=
scripts.build:api: cross-env-shell pack build $IMAGE_PREFIX/aisaas-api -p ../../code/gen/api -B paketobuildpacks/builder:base -b paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./node_modules/@sap/cds/bin/cds-serve.js -e BP_NODE_RUN_SCRIPTS=
scripts.build:broker: cross-env-shell pack build $IMAGE_PREFIX/aisaas-broker -p ../../code/broker -B paketobuildpacks/builder:base -b paketo-buildpacks/nodejs -e BP_LAUNCHPOINT=./start.js
scripts.push:all: npm run push:srv && npm run push:db-com && npm run push:router && npm run push:api && npm run push:broker && npm run push:html5-deployer
